PageTitle: display bgp ipv6 routing-table dampening parameter
FuncDef: The display bgp ipv6 routing-table dampening parameter command displays configured BGP4+ route dampening parameters.
CLIs: display bgp ipv6 routing-table dampening parameter
Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp ipv6 routing-table dampening parameter
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check configured BGP4+ route dampening parameters, run the display bgp ipv6 routing-table dampening parameter command.
